purpose: To manage and organize tasks for AI development teams in a collaborative environment
principle: Built on a web-based interface using JavaScript frameworks to facilitate task tracking and collaboration
reusability: Offers an API for integration with other project management tools, and supports plugin extensions for customization
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited features and potential bugs, primarily designed for small to medium-sized teams
name: ai-dev-tasks
description: A simple task management system for managing AI dev in Cursor
highlight: Streamlined task management specifically tailored for AI development projects
